title: Initial Access
description: Enter the 4-digit code on the screen. The order of the digits does not matter.

title: Troubleshooting a Locked Screen
description: If the screen locks up (numbers remain displayed and the system doesn't respond), repeatedly press any buttons on the screen until the screen goes blank with a red blinking light. This resets the system.

title: Reaccessing After Reset
description: Once the screen is blank and the red light is blinking, re-enter the 4-digit code to access the system.

title: Successful Entry Confirmation
description: Verify that you have successfully accessed the system.
